remarks: Lemma for ~ alexsubALT .  A compact space has a subbase such that every cover taken from it has a finite subcover.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 27-Jan-2010.)
statement:
alexsubALT.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
alexsubALTlem1 $p |- ( J e. Comp -> E. x ( J = ( topGen ` ( fi ` x ) ) /\ A. c e. ~P x ( X = U. c -> E. d e. ( ~P c i^i Fin ) X = U. d ) ) ) $.
$d J c d x $.
$d X c d x $.
